Introduction

Carlyn is a Filipino singer. She is the former leader of the international project girl group Z-Girls and a former member of the Filipino girl group Pop Girls. Carlyn is in a relationship with basketball player and fan, Von Ordoña. In February 2021, she revealed that she was expecting her first child. She announced her departure from Z-Girls in June 2021 following the reveal of her pregnancy. She was a contestant on V-1 (Vocal No .1).
